name: Picnic Panic (Fenomanu)
description:
Get the keys to continue with your mission, use "WASD" to move and left click to shoot or your gamepad using left joystick and "RB" to shoot.

You can also recruit some teammates by pressing "space" or "A" button in your controller. If you lose one you will also lose its power!

You are also able to change between different types of bullets by pressing "q" and "e" or the left D-pad in your controller.
